code: import{dot,norm,acos,unit}from'mathjs';export const calculateAngle=(a,b,c)=>{const ba=[a[0]-b[0],a[1]-b[1]];const bc=[c[0]-b[0],c[1]-b[1]];const cosineAngle=dot(ba,bc)/(norm(ba)*norm(bc));const clippedCosineAngle=Math.max(-1,Math.min(1,cosineAngle));const angleRad=acos(clippedCosineAngle);const angleDeg=unit(angleRad,'rad').toNumber('deg');return angleDeg;};
